scripts.build: hexo clean && hexo generate && hexo deploy && cp -r public/* ./ && rm -rf api-console/static api-console/index.html && cd api-console/react-app && npm run build && cd ../../ && cp -r api-console/react-app/build/* api-console/ && sed -i '' 's//static/\./static/g' api-console/index.html
